TopicTitle: Hey, i need a big favor

Articles.Content:
So i got banned by some 7-year-old moderator on a direwolf20 server(it's a modpack that comes with FTB) Version 5.2.1

The server IP is 76.30.196.226 and pretty much is i need someone to get on that server, and tell the owner (akernator) that username tealc176 got banned without cause

(yes, i really didn't do anything other than say a few things)

If no one has done it for you by the time I wake up (I'm just going to bed now), I'll definitely do it for you.

P.s. I'll be up around 10:30 PDT
Why did the 7 year old ban you?

Because i got into an argument with one of his friends. and after wandering around aimlessly for 2 hours in the world, i stumble upon his base.

I watching from a distance see him toss some items into a fire, and then told the admin i "stole" from him, and begged the admin for 2 hours to ban me.

BTW: his username is jmoreland, so avoid him, sammoreland, Davidvo(numbers), bobafer24, cornalcandy, wiffer17

[maj0rpwn,nightofdawn, pixeloffire,] are just greifers who act nice, but when it get's late, BAM someone get's TNTed

BTW, if anyone asks how you know me. just say that i'm exercising my right to a jury. (because 'MURICA), and that i have to be un-banned to state my case

Edited May 18, 2013 by rewdew2
